attributes.action: Regulate retail prices at Airports, Railway Stations and Event Venues with a captive audience
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In line with consumer protection and the sales of goods, prices of basic food, beverage and confectionary products should be in line with those charged at regular high street outlets. If this is not possible, Airports, Railway Stations, Event and other venues with a captive audience should be obliged to clearly display signs stating: "Please note that many products sold in this shop/venue are sold at a higher retail price than in our/the equivalent high street store."
